programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Four winners of the heats face each other in two eliminators, a play-off and a final battle between the two remaining robots. Only the most ferocious robot will be able to call themselves, the New Blood Champions.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey. From humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first heat of the All-Stars Championship, this heat determines which two robots go through to All-stars grand-final. Veteran robots all enter the arena once again as they put their experience to the test against each other.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six more renowned robots fight their way through the heats to fight for a chance to be the All-Star champion. One competitor in particular strikes fear into the roster. The two winners of each heat face off for the title in the Grand Final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme Series continues with the Annihilator; a knockout competition between six competitors, over the course of four rounds and a final, six will be reduced to one, the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A knockout tournament with children at the helm. Will the house robots go easy on the kids, or will they just be easy targets?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Sixteen robots make eight teams in this Tag Team Terror. With only one robot permitted to battle at a time, will the teams share responsibility or will one bite off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The New Blood Heats consisted of two three-way melees and then head-to-head battles, the two winners of the latter would fight, and the remaining robot would be sent to the Grand Finals. The champions would gain automatic entry to The Seventh Wars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The New Blood heats continue as six more robots come to test their metal. One of the competitors takes a beating from the house robots, will it spell the end of their time in the competition?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The arena welcomes six new combatants during the third round of the heats. One competitor that seemingly lacks a weapon, surprises the judges. The two new house robots both get a chance to attack.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Fourth and last heat to decide which robots will make it to the final. Refbot loses his patience and starts inflicting harm on the competitors.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Four winners of the heats face each other in two eliminators, a play-off and a final battle between the two remaining robots. Only the most ferocious robot will be able to call themselves, the New Blood Champions.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A champion will emerge for each weight class battling in this Robot Rampage. Including Antweight, Middleweight, Lightweight and Featherweight.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A battle for one of the most prized robot wars possessions, the challenge belt. Challengers must defeat each other and take on the current holders, Tornado, if they are to claim it for themselves.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The ladies take over in this episode. Wives, girlfriends, mothers and sisters pilot the robots for this event. Battling through two rounds and a final, one robot will be crowned Iron Maiden Champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots, each representing a different university or college enter the arena. The house robots are have prepared a very valuable lecture for their new class.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robots from Australia, Cyprus, Scotland, England, South Africa, Wales, Canada and Northern Ireland battle in the arena to prove who is the best mechanical combatant in the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight robots from seven different countries battle each other for the title European Champions, including the reigning World Champions and the UK Champions. Will they be able to add another championship title to their collection?

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Robot fightings newest competition begins! In the first heat, meet new robots and some familiar faces as teams get a feel for the arena and size up their competition. Filmed in Grantham in front of a live audience, robots battle for survival in the Robots Live Arena.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Heat 2 of the UKs most brutal robot combat competition takes the action to Crawley in the south of England. Winners and losers from Heat 1 face fresh opponents, fighting to secure a win and guarantee their place in the finals.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: Its the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final. In savage and tactical 1v1 matches, teams battle for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three grueling heats, only the toughest survive. The tournament is now a single-elimination, 1v1, sudden-death formatuntil one team emerges as the victorious champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robot Wars returns. The House Robots have been upgraded and are ready to dismantle any of the 40 competing teams brave enough to enter the hazardous arena.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A Consultant Cardiologist and his two sons try their luck with a brand new, untested machine. Judge Sethu Vijayakumar discusses his work with Nasa in creating androids for the Mission to Mars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The wars begin yet again, competitors can only qualify by destroying or outsmarting their opponents, and doing their best to stay out of the house robots way. Sumo and Pinball Warrior will test the robots grit and accuracy.
